name: Farrell Treatment Center
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Farrell Treatment Center is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in New Britain, CT. From 2018-01 through 2019-06, this provider received $543K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 85% of billing is concentrated in H0015 (H0015), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-06, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
